item.title: Star Trek: Nemesis Completely Wasting Ron Perlman Is Unforgivable
item.description: Ron Perlman’s Viceroy may not go down as one of the Star Trek franchise’s great villains, but it remains a stark reminder of what could have been.

item.title: 28 Years Later Is Officially Retconning 28 Weeks Later's Final Scene
item.description: Zombies were shown running through Paris at the end of 28 Weeks Later, but it seems like the upcoming 28 Years Later will retcon the scene.

item.title: 10 Deaths In The Jurassic Park Franchise We'll Remember Forever
item.description: The Jurassic Park films are popular with audiences of all ages, yet the franchise has some very frightening and gory deaths that are hard to forget.
